question: SLINEX is a bilateral maritime exercise between India and which country?
explanation:
The SLINEX-20 is a bilateral maritime exercise between Indian Navy and Sri Lankan Navy. This yearâ€™s SLINEX is the 8th edition and is taking place from October 19 to 21, 2020 at Trincomalee, Sri Lanka.
The 7th edition was held off the coast of Vizag in the year 2019. This exercise aims to improve the inter-operability of the two navies and exchange the best naval practices.
